thread.title: Salman Khan and Sooraj’s Barjatya’s favorite pose?
thread.title_full: Salman Khan and Sooraj’s Barjatya’s favorite pose?

author: CanIndia News Service 1
title: Salman Khan and Sooraj’s Barjatya’s favorite pose?
text:
0 0 0 0 0 
Mumbai, October 11 (CINEWS): As of late Salman’s most anticipated Diwali release ‘Prem Ratan Dhan Payo’s’ poster was propelled.Salman is looking as enchanting as ever and Sooraj Barjatya brings back the most cherished character of ‘Prem’, through this film. 
Alongside “Prem” the hit couple additionally brings back evergreen recollections of ‘Maine Pyaar Kiya’ and ‘Hum Aapke Hai Kaun’. 
The ‘Prem Ratan Dhan Payo’ poster has striking likeness to the stances Salman has given in his past movies of Sooraj Barjatya like ‘Maine Pyaar Kiya’ and ‘Hum Aapke Hai Kaun’, which were enormous hits. 
The Salman and Sooraj Barjatya hit Jodi is good to go with their next release this Diwali-‘Prem Ratan Dhan Payo’Prem Ratan Dhan Payo’s trailer traversed 5 million views in only 24 hours, just shows how willingly fans are sitting tight for its release.The film is all set to release on twelfth November, 2015.
